com.nexmo.messaging.sdk.messages.parameters
Class ValidityPeriod

java.lang.Object
  com.nexmo.messaging.sdk.messages.parameters.ValidityPeriod
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ValidityPeriod
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

ValidityPeriod.java

Created on 5 January 2011, 17:34

Represents the time period that the submitted message is valid for. Once this time period has elapsed, if it has not yet been delivered, then delivery will be aborted and the message will be expired.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Paul Cook
See Also:

validityPeriodHours - the number of hours that make up the validity period for this message

validityPeriodSeconds - the number of seconds that make up the validity period for this message
